com.articulate.nlp

Class WNsim

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.articulate.nlp.WNsim

  • public class WNsim
extends java.lang.Object
    an implementation of Resnik, P. (1995). Using information content to evaluate semantic similarity in a taxonomy. In Proceedings of the 14th International Joint Conference on Artificial Intelligence, 448â€“453. Adding a similarity method based on synset subsumption.

      • computeSynsetSim

        public static float computeSynsetSim(java.lang.String s1,
                                     java.lang.String s2)
        Compute similarity of two synsets. Note that currently only synsets of the same part of speech have any similarity score.

      • computeWordSim

        public static float computeWordSim(java.lang.String s1,
                                   java.lang.String s2,
                                   boolean allSynsets)
        Compute similarity of two words as the maximum similarity among their possible synsets. Note that currently only synsets of the same part of speech have any similarity score.
        Parameters:
        allSynsets - determines whether to take the best fit from all possible synsets for the words, or just to compare the most frequent synsets for each word

      • readTestFile

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Float>> readTestFile(java.lang.String filename,

                                                                                                                   boolean removePOS)
        Read a space-delimited file of word pairs and their similarity rating.

      • setBits

        public static java.util.BitSet setBits(java.lang.String s)
        Parameters:
        s - is a POS-prefixed synset
        Returns:
        a bit vector comprising set bits for all the children of the given synset
